title: Asian Stocks Edge Up After US CPI Lifts Mood: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities posted a modest gain at the open after recent selling pressure eased and US inflation data supported the outlook for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates this year.
content: Asian equities posted a modest gain at the open after recent selling pressure eased and US inflation data supported the outlook for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates this year.
